DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study 1 ) evaluate extent absorption multiple dose pregabalin control release tablet compare multiple dos pregabalin immediate release capsule , 2 ) evaluate pharmacokinetics multiple dos pregabalin control release tablet compare multiple dos pregabalin immediate release capsule 3 ) evaluate safety tolerability multiple dos pregabalin control release tablet compare multiple dos pregabalin immediate release capsule .
DOC.brief_title: An Investigation Of The Absorption And Pharmacokinetics Of Multiple Doses Of A Controlled Release Pregabalin Tablet As Compared To Multiple Doses Of The Immediate Release Pregabalin Capsule In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate absorption , pharmacokinetics , safety/tolerability multiple dos pregabalin control release tablet compare multiple dos pregabalin immediate release capsule
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Between age 18 55 year , inclusive Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 Illicit drug use Pregnant nursing female Females childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method contraception
